text: 2.6 Stt 19.24, Nam 26.10, Jud 7 Pen binɨb bɨlel taun Sodom ayɨp taun Gomola ayɨp yelak okok, God kɨlop bɨlokɨl nɨbi binɨb kumeb agak. Anɨb ak taun Sodom ayɨp taun Gomola ayɨp, pɨsnep yɨn sɨbok amnak, tun kab ak nep yek. Anɨgek, binɨb God nop kud ñɨl kɨdek ma gɨnɨgun agɨl nepal okok, kɨli Sodom Gomola gak tek chɨnop abe gɨnɨgab agɨl, gos nɨgtep gɨnɨgel.
